name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KTab - Manage Tabs, History, and Bookmarks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool for effortlessly managing your tabs, bookmarks, and browser history

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KTab is a Chrome extension that adds a command palette to your browser.

## Key Features

- Quick access with keyboard shortcut (Cmd+Shift+K / Ctrl+Shift+K)
- Search across tabs, history, bookmarks, and Google suggestions
- Tab management and quick actions
- Keyboard navigation
